events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster as a software developer role. We will proceed with the next steps shortly.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application. They will contact you soon to discuss further details.
Your initial screening interview went well. The interviewer was impressed by your experience with software development and problem-solving skills.
Thank you for your prompt response to our interview feedback. We appreciate your enthusiasm and readiness to proceed further in the hiring process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th, 10 AM UTC. The session will focus on coding challenges and system design.
